title: Farla Medical KleenMe Rubber Gloves Pack of 6 Medium Household Essentials for Cleaning & Washing Up Flocked Lining Yellow Gloves
features: Perfect For Household Cleaning – Choose from the variety of colours and sizes of KleenMe washing gloves to find exactly what you need. You can even use the different colours to colour code for different jobs around the house, from washing up to bathroom cleaning.
Flocked Lining – Each rubber glove is lined with a layer of soft cotton, making taking them off and putting them on easier than ever.
Durable – Made from a strong rubber compound, KleenMe household washing up gloves are resistant to tears and punctures.
Various Sizes – Make sure you get that perfect fit ; use our sizing guide to find the right size for you. Available in Small, Medium, Large, and Extra Large sizes.

Multi-Purpose – Whether you're using these gloves as kitchen gloves, electric gloves, or dishwashing gloves, you can be certain that your hands are protected. Manufactured by Farla, a long-standing medical supplies company who work closely with the NHS, private healthcare providers and care homes across the UK and the world.
description: Kleen Rubber Cleaning Gloves are essential for protecting your hands when washing and doing household cleaning tasks. These gloves are lined with soft cotton layer so they’re easy to put on and take off. They’re made with strong rubber material making them resistant to tears and punctures. With several colours and sizes to choose from, you’ll surely find one that fits you perfectly Order this household essential today!
